review: I use this device exclusively for Netflix and Hulu.  Ocassionaly I rent or buy movies from iTunes.  For my needs, this device works flawlessly ---no stream interruptions, lack of audio synchroniy, high quality picture for my HDTV., and easy to use (I am a senior citizen and not tech oriented).  Prior to this I had Roky that I bought approximately in 2006.  Compared to the older Roku, the Apple TV is significantly better.  Overall, I'm pleased with this streaming device and I highly recommend it.
author: Clemencia Lopez

review: If you love dropped frames (stuttering playback) you will love this product. This is a known problem. Up until a few months ago it worked fine, hence the good reviews for this product. I own a Roku too and it has a few issues but none as amazingly frustrating as the horrible video playback.

review: We bought this in January. In March, it stopped working. The white light is rapidly blinking and the TV screen just shows the apple logo. There is no way to reboot it (we've tried using a microUSB to restore in iTunes, but no dice). Apparently this is a not uncommon problem, but Apple doesn't have a solution. So frustrating.
